data: {"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"プログラミングをしていると度々「静的～」「動的～」と聞くことがあります。","href":null}]}
{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"まずはこれについて説明しましょう。","href":null}]}
{"color":"default","parent":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ここで言われる静的というのは、事前に作られたものだけを実行できるもののことです。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"では、逆に動的というのはなんなのかですが、これは入力に応じてどんどん実行できるものを増やせるもののことです。","href":null}]}
{"color":"default","parent":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"ではお互いに何が利点なのかというと、\n「静的～」は決められた分の仕事しかしないのでシステムなどで不用意に他のメモリなどを圧迫せず安全に実行ができ、\n「動的～」はユーザーがアプリなどでメモや写真などのなにかを保存するときにいくらでも増やせて、しかもその時々での最低限の保存量になるので変に処理を食ったりしなくなります。","href":null}]}
{"color":"default","parent":[]}
{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"以上が二つの違いです。","href":null}]}

{"parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"静的ルーティングの実装","href":null}],"color":"default","is_toggleable":false}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"「これはFletで作られたアプリです。」とだけ表示する情報ページと相互にページ遷移をできるボタンを各ページに追加します。","href":null}]}
{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"直接各ルートに遷移する場合はこのように書きます。","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    counter = ft.Text("0", size=50, data=0)

    def increment_click(e):
        counter.data += 1
        counter.value = str(counter.data)
        counter.update()

    def route_change(route):  #
        page.views.clear()  #

        if page.route == "/info":  #
            page.views.append(  #
                ft.View(  #
                    route="/info",  #
                    controls=[  #
                        ft.Text("これはFletで作られたアプリです。"),  #
                        ft.ElevatedButton("カウンターへ", on_click=lambda _: page.go("/"))  #
                    ]  #
                )  #
            )  #

        else:  #
            page.views.append(  #
                ft.View(  #
                    route="/",  #
                    controls=[  #
                        ft.SafeArea(ft.Container(counter, alignment=ft.alignment.center), expand=True),  #
                        ft.ElevatedButton("情報ページへ", on_click=lambda _: page.go("/info"))  #
                    ],  #
                    floating_action_button=ft.FloatingActionButton(  #
                        icon=ft.Icons.ADD, on_click=increment_click  #
                    )  #
                )  #
            )  #

        page.update()  #

    page.on_route_change = route_change  #
    page.go(page.route)  #

ft.app(main)
"],"caption":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"この書き方であれば静的ルーティングを直感的に実装できます。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"page.views.clear()","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"\nアプリ内の","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"View","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"の表示を消します。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"route_change","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"\nルート遷移用の関数（名前は任意）\nしていることは、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"View","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"を消してから指定（引数）のあったルートへif文で指定して準備し、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"page.update","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"でそれを表示しています。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"page.go()","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"\n引数として渡されたルートに遷移する。\n（この引数が","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"route_change","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"の引数に渡されることによってページを遷移している。）","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"その場合は以下のような書き方をします。","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft


def main(page: ft.Page):
    counter = ft.Text("0", size=50, data=0)

    def increment_click(e):
        counter.data += 1
        counter.value = str(counter.data)
        counter.update()

    def route_change(route):
        page.views.clear()

        page.views.append(  #
            ft.View(  #
                route="/",  #
                controls=[  #
                    ft.SafeArea(ft.Container(counter, alignment=ft.alignment.center), expand=True),  #
                    ft.ElevatedButton("情報ページへ", on_click=lambda _: page.go("/info"))  #
                ],  #
                floating_action_button=ft.FloatingActionButton(  #
                    icon=ft.Icons.ADD, on_click=increment_click  #
                ),  #
                appbar=ft.AppBar(title=ft.Text("カウンター"), bgcolor=ft.Colors.BLUE),  #
            )  #
        )  #

        if page.route == "/info":
            page.views.append(
                ft.View(
                    route="/info",
                    controls=[
                        ft.Text("これはFletで作られたアプリです。"),
                        ft.ElevatedButton("戻る", on_click=lambda _: page.go("/"))
                    ],  #
                    appbar=ft.AppBar(title=ft.Text("情報"), bgcolor=ft.Colors.BLUE),  #
                )
            )

        page.update()

    def view_pop(view):  #
        page.views.pop()  #
        top_view = page.views[-1]  #
        page.go(top_view.route)  #

    page.on_route_change = route_change
    page.on_view_pop = view_pop  #

    page.go(page.route)

ft.app(main)
"],"caption":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"先ほどのコードでは","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"View","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"を一つしか設置していなかったのに、こちらでは問答無用で「","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"/","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"」ページが設置された後に指定されたルートが「","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"/info","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"」の場合にその上に表示するようになっています。","href":null}]}
